section.section:
This section applies to:
policies of commercial insurance; and
policies of workers' compensation insurance.

text.section: Unless an insurer has given notice of its intention not to renew a policy subject to this section, if the insurer seeks to increase the renewal policy premium, the insurer shall send a notice to the named insured and insurance producer, if any, not less than 45 days prior to the renewal date of the policy.

Subject to subsection (d) of this section, a notice under this section shall include:
both the expiring policy premium and the renewal policy premium; and
the telephone number for the insurer or insurance producer, if any, together with a statement that the insured may call to request additional information about the premium increase.

section.section:
If an insurer seeks to increase the renewal policy premium and the insurer's rating methodology requires the insured to provide information to calculate the renewal policy premium, an insurer shall provide a reasonable estimate of the renewal policy premium if:
the insurer has requested the required information from the insured; and
the insurer has not received the requested information.
A reasonable estimate under this subsection shall be based upon the information available to the insurer at the time the notice is sent.

text.section: A notice required by this section shall be sent by first-class mail and may be sent together with the renewal policy.

An insurer shall be considered to have met the notice requirement of this section if, not less than 45 days before the effective date of the renewal policy, the insurer has sent:
to the named insured, a renewal policy that includes the renewal policy premium; and
to the independent insurance producer, if any:
to the named insured and insurance producer, if any, a written notice of renewal or continuation of coverage that includes the renewal or continuation premium; or
to the named insured and insurance producer, if any, a renewal offer that includes a reasonable estimate of the renewal policy premium.
